Html:
Hello !
The GetPlayers function doesn't work for me at one of servers.
On other servers works at it isn't present. The server so that not to provide statistics on players can be configured (if it is possible)?! But there is a paradox at them on the page of the site monitoring of this server is integrated.

CODE:
QueryMaster.Server server = QueryMaster.ServerQuery.GetServerInstance(QueryMaster.EngineType.Source, "46.188.16.205", 2303);
ReadOnlyCollection<QueryMaster.Player> players = server.GetPlayers();

What kind of error are u getting?
Read the Exception handling section in https://querymaster.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Updates%28Version%201.1%29
paste here your received data(in hex format).
